00030 RigidBody3D::RigidBody3D() : RigidBody()
00031 {
00032 }
00033 
00034 RigidBody3D::RigidBody3D( std::string title_in,
00035                     Node* node0_in,
00036                     Node* node1_in,
00037                     Node* node2_in,
00038                     Node* node3_in,
00039                     double mass_in,
00040                     std::vector<double> I_in
00041                   )
00042   : RigidBody( title_in ),
00043     mass( mass_in ), Ixx( I_in[0] ), Iyy( I_in[1] ), Izz( I_in[2] )
00044 {
00045   nodes.push_back( node0_in );
00046   nodes.push_back( node1_in );
00047   nodes.push_back( node2_in );
00048   nodes.push_back( node3_in );
00049   this->massMatrix.resize( 4*Simulation::getDim(), 4*Simulation::getDim() );
00050   this->externalForces.resize( 4*Simulation::getDim() );
00051 }
00052 
00053 RigidBody3D::~RigidBody3D()
00054 {
00055 }
00056 
00057 void RigidBody3D::calcMassMatrix()
00058 {
00059 
00060   Pxx = .5*( -Ixx +Iyy +Izz ); cout<<"Pxx"<<Pxx<<endl;
00061   Pyy = .5*( +Ixx -Iyy +Izz ); cout<<"Pyy"<<Pyy<<endl;
00062   Pzz = .5*( +Ixx +Iyy -Izz ); cout<<"Pzz"<<Pzz<<endl;
00063 
00064   /* For Problem in 3D
00065    *  MassMatrix = | m00*I3 m01*I3 m02*I3 m03*I3 |
00066    *               | m10*I3 Pxx*I3   0*I3   0*I3 |
00067    *               | m20*I3   0*I3 Pyy*I3   0*I3 |
00068    *               | m30*I3   0*I3   0*I3 Pzz*I3 |
00069    */
00070 
00071   /* m00*I3 */
00072   this->massMatrix( 0, 0) = mass +Pxx +Pyy +Pzz ;
00073   this->massMatrix( 1, 1) = mass +Pxx +Pyy +Pzz ;
00074   this->massMatrix( 2, 2) = mass +Pxx +Pyy +Pzz ;
00075 
00076   /* m01*I3 */
00077   this->massMatrix( 0, 3) = -Pxx ;
00078   this->massMatrix( 1, 4) = -Pxx ;
00079   this->massMatrix( 2, 5) = -Pxx ;
00080 
00081   /* m02*I3 */
00082   this->massMatrix( 0, 6) = -Pyy ;
00083   this->massMatrix( 1, 7) = -Pyy ;
00084   this->massMatrix( 2, 8) = -Pyy ;
00085 
00086   /* m03*I3 */
00087   this->massMatrix( 0, 9) = -Pzz ;
00088   this->massMatrix( 1,10) = -Pzz ;
00089   this->massMatrix( 2,11) = -Pzz ;
00090 
00091   /* m10*I3 */
00092   this->massMatrix( 3, 0) = -Pxx ;
00093   this->massMatrix( 4, 1) = -Pxx ;
00094   this->massMatrix( 5, 2) = -Pxx ;
00095 
00096   /* m20*I3 */
00097   this->massMatrix( 6, 0) = -Pyy ;
00098   this->massMatrix( 7, 1) = -Pyy ;
00099   this->massMatrix( 8, 2) = -Pyy ;
00100 
00101   /* m03*I3 */
00102   this->massMatrix( 0, 9) = -Pzz ;
00103   this->massMatrix( 1,10) = -Pzz ;
00104   this->massMatrix( 2,11) = -Pzz ;
00105 
00106   /* Pxx*I3 */
00107   this->massMatrix( 3, 3) = +Pxx ;
00108   this->massMatrix( 4, 4) = +Pxx ;
00109   this->massMatrix( 5, 5) = +Pxx ;
00110 
00111   /* Pyy*I3 */
00112   this->massMatrix( 6, 6) = +Pyy ;
00113   this->massMatrix( 7, 7) = +Pyy ;
00114   this->massMatrix( 8, 8) = +Pyy ;
00115 
00116   /* Pzz*I3 */
00117   this->massMatrix( 9, 9) = +Pzz ;
00118   this->massMatrix(10,10) = +Pzz ;
00119   this->massMatrix(11,11) = +Pzz ;
00120 }
00121 
00122 void RigidBody3D::calcExternalForces()
00123 {
00124   /*For Problem in 3D*/
00125   this->externalForces(0) = -mass*Simulation::getGravity(0);
00126   this->externalForces(1) = -mass*Simulation::getGravity(1);
00127   this->externalForces(2) = -mass*Simulation::getGravity(2);
00128   //~ int i;
00129   //~ for( i=0; i<externalForces.size(); ++i)
00130   //~ {
00131      //~ this->externalForces(i) = -( massMatrix.readElement(i, 0)
00132                                       //~ + massMatrix.readElement(i, 3)
00133                                       //~ + massMatrix.readElement(i, 6)
00134                                       //~ + massMatrix.readElement(i, 9)
00135                                       //~ )*Simulation::getGravity(0)
00136                                       //~ -
00137                                       //~ ( this->massMatrix.readElement(i, 1)
00138                                       //~ + this->massMatrix.readElement(i, 4)
00139                                       //~ + this->massMatrix.readElement(i, 7)
00140                                       //~ + this->massMatrix.readElement(i,10)
00141                                       //~ )*Simulation::getGravity(1)
00142                                       //~ -
00143                                       //~ ( this->massMatrix.readElement(i, 2)
00144                                       //~ + this->massMatrix.readElement(i, 5)
00145                                       //~ + this->massMatrix.readElement(i, 8)
00146                                       //~ + this->massMatrix.readElement(i,11)
00147                                       //~ )*Simulation::getGravity(2);
00148   //~ }
00149 }
00150 
00151 Node * RigidBody3D::getNode( std::string name_in )
00152 {
00153   if( name_in == "NODEA" )
00154   {
00155      return this->nodes[0];
00156   }
00157   if( name_in == "NODEB" )
00158   {
00159      return this->nodes[1];
00160   }
00161   if( name_in == "NODEC" )
00162   {
00163      return this->nodes[2];
00164   }
00165   if( name_in == "NODED" )
00166   {
00167      return this->nodes[3];
00168   }
00169   else
00170   {
00171      cout << "ERROR: NO NODE WITH THAT NAME IN BAR" << endl;
00172   }
00173 }
